title: IRC27 IOTA NFT Metadata Schema
description: A JSON schema for validating IRC27 compliant NFT metadata

standard.description: identifier for the metadata standard used

version.description: version of the metadata standard used

name.description: A descriptive name of the token

description.description: some information about the NFT project

uri.description: URI pointing to the resource where the file with `type` MIME type is hosted

collectionName.description: A human readable name for the NFT collection

royalties.description: object containing the payout addresses mapped to their percentage share

attributes.description: array containing any additional data as objects.
